name: Huckleberry Falls
description: A new kind of match game! Set in a post apocalyptic world, use your wits and bombs to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2/Vista/7 Processor: 2.0 GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
